info.title: Remote Cartesi Machine
info.description: API for controlling a remote Cartesi Machine server

methods.name: fork
methods.summary: Forks the server

methods.name: rebind
methods.summary: Changes the address the server is listening to

result.name: address
result.description: URL of address server actually bound to

methods.name: shutdown
methods.summary: Causes the server to shutdown and exit

methods.name: get_version
methods.summary: Returns the server version

methods.name: is_empty
methods.summary: Checks if server has no machine instance

result.name: empty
result.description: True if server has no machine

methods.name: machine.set_runtime_config
methods.summary: Changes the machine runtime configuration

methods.name: machine.get_runtime_config
methods.summary: Returns the current machine runtime configuration

methods.name: machine.create
methods.summary: Instantiates a machine from a machine configuration

params.name: directory
params.description: Directory to create an on-disk machine instance

methods.name: machine.load
methods.summary: Instantiates a machine from a directory where a machine instance was stored

methods.name: machine.destroy
methods.summary: Destroys current machine instance

methods.name: machine.store
methods.summary: Stores machine instance in a directory

methods.name: machine.clone_stored
methods.summary: Clones a machine stored from source directory to destination directory

methods.name: machine.remove_stored
methods.summary: Removes a stored machine instance from a directory

methods.name: machine.run
methods.summary: Runs the emulator until a given cycle

params.name: mcycle_end
params.description: The maximum value of the cycle counter

methods.name: machine.collect_mcycle_root_hashes
methods.summary: Collect root hashes periodically while running the emulator

params.name: mcycle_period
params.description: Number of machine cycles between root hashes to collect

params.name: mcycle_phase
params.description: Number of machine cycles elapsed since last root hash collected

params.name: log2_bundle_mcycle_count
params.description: Log base 2 of the amount of mcycle root hashes to bundle

methods.name: machine.run_uarch
methods.summary: Runs the small emulator until a given cycle

params.name: uarch_cycle_end
params.description: The maximum value of the cycle counter

methods.name: machine.collect_uarch_cycle_root_hashes
methods.summary: Collect root hashes while running the emulator's uarch

params.name: mcycle_end
params.description: End machine cycle value to execute, uarch cycle by uarch cycle

params.name: log2_bundle_uarch_cycle_count
params.description: Log base 2 of the amount of uarch cycle root hashes to bundle

methods.name: machine.log_step_uarch
methods.summary: Runs the small emulator for one cycle and return a log of state accesses

params.name: log_type
params.description: The maximum value of the cycle counter

methods.name: machine.verify_step_uarch
methods.summary: Verifies a state transition caused by log_step_uarch

params.name: root_hash_before
params.description: State hash before transition described by access log

params.name: root_hash_after
params.description: State hash after transition described by access log

methods.name: machine.verify_reset_uarch
methods.summary: Verifies a state transition caused by log_reset_uarch

params.name: root_hash_before
params.description: State hash before transition described by access log

params.name: root_hash_after
params.description: State hash after transition described by access log

methods.name: machine.get_root_hash
methods.summary: Obtains the hash-tree root hash of the current machine state

methods.name: machine.get_proof
methods.summary: Obtains a hash-tree proof for a range in the machine state

params.name: address
params.description: Starting address of range in state (must be aligned to size)

methods.name: machine.get_hash_tree_stats
methods.summary: Returns statistics for the hash tree

params.name: clear
params.description: Whether to clear the stats after retrieving them

methods.name: machine.read_word
methods.summary: Reads a 64-bit word from memory (must be aligned)

methods.name: machine.write_word
methods.summary: Writes a 64-bit word from memory (must be aligned)

methods.name: machine.read_memory
methods.summary: Reads a span of memory from the state (must be contained in the same memory range)

methods.name: machine.write_memory
methods.summary: Writes a span of memory to the state (must be contained in the same memory range)

methods.name: machine.read_virtual_memory
methods.summary: Reads a span of memory from the state (must be contained in the same memory range)

params.name: address
params.description: Starting virtual address of span according to current mapping

methods.name: machine.write_virtual_memory
methods.summary: Writes a span of memory to the state (must be contained in the same memory range)

params.name: address
params.description: Starting virtual address of span according to current mapping

methods.name: machine.translate_virtual_address
methods.summary: Translates a virtual memory address to its corresponding physical memory address

methods.name: machine.replace_memory_range
methods.summary: Replaces a memory range

params.name: range
params.description: New memory range (must be compatible with existing range)

methods.name: machine.read_register
methods.summary: Reads the value of a register

methods.name: machine.write_reg
methods.summary: Writes the value of a register

methods.name: machine.get_reg_address
methods.summary: Returns the address of a register

methods.name: machine.reset_uarch
methods.summary: Reset uarch to pristine state

methods.name: machine.log_reset_uarch
methods.summary: Reset uarch to pristine state and return a log of state accesses

params.name: log_type
params.description: The maximum value of the cycle counter

methods.name: machine.get_initial_config
methods.summary: Returns initial machine configuration for instance

methods.name: machine.get_default_config
methods.summary: Returns default machine configuration

methods.name: machine.verify_hash_tree
methods.summary: Verifies sanity of hash tree

result.name: valid
result.description: True if hash tree is sane

methods.name: machine.get_address_ranges
methods.summary: Returns a list with descriptions for all of the machine's address ranges

methods.name: machine.send_cmio_response
methods.summary: Sends cmio response.

methods.name: machine.log_send_cmio_response
methods.summary: Sends cmio response and returns an access log

methods.name: machine.verify_send_cmio_response
methods.summary: Verifies a state transition caused by log_send_cmio_response

params.name: data
params.description: The response data sent when the log was generated.

params.name: root_hash_before
params.description: State hash before response was sent.

params.name: log
params.description: State access log to be verified.

params.name: root_hash_after
params.description: State hash after response was sent.

methods.name: machine.log_step
methods.summary: Logs a step of a given number of cycles

methods.name: machine.verify_step
methods.summary: Checks the validity of a step log file.

params.name: filename
params.description: Filename containing the log of the step
